content: विरामः {@--1@} ({%a%}) Cessation, discontinuance; सुधां विना न प्रययुर्विरामं <ls>Bh. 2. 80</ls>; प्रवृत्तस्याविरामे भवंती शासितव्या <ls>Mbh.</ls> ({%b%}) Rest, repose. {@--2@} End, termination, conclusion; रजनिरिदानीमियमपि याति विरामं <ls>Gīt. 5</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 16</ls>, <ls>Māl. 9. 34.</ls> {@--3@} Pause, stop. {@--4@} The stop or pause of the voice; <ls>Mk. 3. 5.</ls> {@--5@} A small oblique stroke placed under a consonant, usually at the end of a sentence. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
